14521.content:
“I’ll go the Mud Bath first!”

Cindy nodded her head, “Good choice. I’ll guide you to it.”

So, the two women headed in the direction of the Mud Bath. Suzy couldn’t be more excited to be inside a place were she could be as pampered and spoiled as she was at home without the need to actually do any “work” to earn it.

Her eyes couldn’t be more at peace with the relaxing ambient white that decorated the interior. It was as if Steve Jobs had come back to life an reimagined his company as a Spa Treatment center. Simple and white. Nothing more it.

“So, Suzy. What exactly is your line of work?” Mindy inquired. “Well, I run a youtube channel called KittyKat Gaming with my husband and-“

“Sorry to cut you short, but we’re here. Mindy will help you with the treatment. If you need anything, Lindy will help you.”

“Oh, thanks.”

Suzy stepped through the doorway to be greeted by Lindy, who dressed just as professionally as Cindy, but had shoulder length hair. With the same color too.

“You are here for the Mud Bath, yes?” she spoke with a thick Russian accent, “Undress in the closet and hop in the tub.”

Suzy was taken aback by the direct orders, but did the orders anyhow. She undressed and walked out in her black bathing suit. Before her was the bathtub that sunk beneath the tiles. The brown slobby mixture of dirt and water occasionally bubbled, signifying that it must be warm, but she had to make sure.

Suzy dipped a toe, “Oh, yeah. That’s perfect.”

Soon she had completely submerged her body within the mud. It’s warm, yet sloppy firmness had held her in such a way nothing else had before. At this point in time, she had felt truly relaxed.

Suzy closed her eyes and let the mud do it’s job of completely relaxing her body.

“Excuse me,” Suzy opened her eyes to see Mindy at her side, “If at any point during the bath you get hungry there are buttons at your side.” Suzy looked over to indeed see buttons to her side, “These buttons control a hose and a robotic hand that feed you both food and drink. Namely soda and pizza and chocolates, seeing as that was what the researchers said women preferred.”

A brief moment of silence passed, “Anyhow, I’ll leave you to relax.”

“Hm? A feeding button, huh.”
14521.title: Bath in Mud

choices: Shut up her stomach by overindulging again
Walk it off and explore the resort.
14522.content:
“Wow. It’s so fancy,” gasped Suzy stepping into the resort’s five star buffet. Her eyes drank in the Spanish influenced interior design. Its meets the criteria of above and beyond in presentation while also being fetching and memorable in food selection. Additionally, Suzy’s nose had been entranced by the pleasant, mouth watering smell that flowed from the heating plates.

She swipes her dark hair from her astonished face and does what anyone would do. Grab a plate and start chowing down. Which was much easier said than done. The entire buffet had to be the size of a football field with a selection from every region in the world; America, Europe, Africa, Asia, Australia, Antarctica, Mexico, Russia. The list went on and on. In combination of that list came the overwhelming selection.

Being the weeabo that she is, Suzy started her meal in the Asia section, specifically, Japan, “Oh man. Arin would love this place,” giggled the “gamer” plucking sushi and sashimi onto her plate. She made a bee-line for America. Stealing slices of pizza, a few burgers, and onion rings.

Suzy returned to her table with a plate piled full of sushi, ramen, and other oily foods. Her chopsticks plucked off the edibles into her hungry mouth. The sushi served here, surprisingly, tasted leagues better than the sushi she ate in Japan.

After the third helping, Suzy still felt a hankering to eat. She decided to deviate from the safe options of American and Japanese cuisine to eat from the other areas of the world. “Kangaroo meat? Peanut Butter Soup? Borsche? Well, since it’s here.”

To keep things short, Suzy had found a liking to food from different cultures.

It wasn’t until her twelfth plate and tenth pitcher of Mountain Dew that Suzy had actually stopped eating. Her bloated stomach rose and fell with each labored breath. Suzy had gone way past her limit, possibly consuming enough calories to be in the high thousands.

Even worse had to be the clothes she wore. Already a little tight on her body after the fifteen pound weight gain. Her green short sleeve v-neck shirt hardly covered her stomach at this point, clinging to her torso tightly. It dug into her softer upper arms and b-cup breasts.

Suzy gulped the last mouthful of food and pushed herself away from the table, “Whew. I lost control there,” hiccupped the streamer.

So far her stay in the resort already left a positive impression on her. Despite her stay only starting hours ago.

A rumble erupted in her stomach, “There’s no way I can be hungry again. Ugh.”

Suzy decides to…
14522.title: Grab a bite to eat at the buffet

choices: She finds her room and luggage
145221.content:
The gamer girl closed her eyes with a heavy sigh. As reluctant as she was, Suzy pushed herself from the table and headed back to the buffet. A phenomenon known as sudden onset hunger had hit her once more. Was it because she was on vacation? That’s one variable. Was it because she was in a room containing a damn near endless source of delectable food? That’s better. Was it because her eyes had laid on the Japan section of the buffet complete with sushi conveyer belt? There’s your answer. Besides, she might as well get as much as she can, she paid for it after all.
Despite the vacation aspect of her situation, Suzy wasted no time picking from every platter to pile up her plate. Pot stickers, white rice, roll after roll of sushi, lobster, bowls of udon noodles, and crab Rangoon. Her inner weeb smiled ear to ear with every quick bite she greedily took. Suzy would kick herself if she could for not snapping a pic of the delightful oriental feast before her for her twitter followers.
“There will be other chances,” she tells herself licking the crab Rangoon grease from her lip. Suzy downs spoonful’s of udon broth with white rice soaking the liquid up. The lobster soaked in butter disappeared in seconds after soon laid eyes on it. To top it all off, in a moment of pure gluttony, Suzy drank just a bit of the lobster butter. Melted butter was a taboo little thing for her to enjoy.
The youtuber laid back, rubbing her stomach in satisfaction now that the awful hunger sensation has dissipated. Thoughts of feeling like a bloated pig with thyroid issues would have to wait for tomorrow. Where she could try dieting again.
Suzy laid her head back while her stomach sloshed and churned, “Just for today. Tomorrow will be better.” After several moments of rubbing her taut midsection, Suzy stood up. As before her clothes felt even tighter. Especially when she peered down to see a belly forming. Her muffin top had been bloated with fish and rice into giving Suzy a preview of what’s in store if she doesn’t watch her eating.
She too ignored the fullness of her stomach. It was taut and bloated with fish and rice. Suzy couldn't deny the calling to the cake. “Better get out of here before you get any bigger.”
Only two steps were travelled before an enticing aroma floated around her nostrils. The scent had led her to a thick, triple decker fudge cake next to a platter of salted caramel doughnuts. Suzy sweated with a whimper. This time her stomach wasn’t instigating any actions, rather it was the satisfaction of enjoying desert after a meal. “…well…”, she thought, biting her lip. Her stomach felt taut, near the brink of utter fullness, yet she wanted just a little taste of both. “Just a little slice of both.”
Soon those little slices became more slices until Suzy ate the entire cake. Same with the donuts. Nothing much to describe here folks, just telling what happened.
Suzy let out a little whine. Her sudden huge appetite had gone too far. The dark green shirt she wore couldn’t passively cover her stomach that had become bloated with an immense amount of carbs. Resting in a chair, she had to force a lean back. Any forward movement would hurt her stomach.
As time passes, the pain subsides, and Suzy without a second thought dashes out of the buffet. Next time, she’ll have to control herself a better.

Suzy, still stuffed to the brim, walks around the Hotel until…
145221.title: Buffet Round 2

151331.content:
"Welcome. Madam. Welcome to ze 'Fit' farm. May I take care of your luggage."

Germaine, the incredibly voluptuous, overweight gothic hipster sighed in relief, "Thank you! I've gotten so fat that I feel like my huge ass and breasts are heavier than my luggage."

The French man smiled, Germaine indeed is as huge as she blatantly state. Large barely covered melons almost bursting out of her top. A small pudgy belly that crafted chunky loved handles at her waist. And to top it all off a nice, big watermelon sized butt barely contained in her ripped black pants. Germaine smoothed back her purple ponytailed hair. Shaved at both sides of her head.

"Now...eh...while I carry your...really heavy luggage to the room...huff...you can take yourself to ze buffet or ze spa..."

"B-buffet? As in all you can eat? Why would you include that in a fitness resort?"

"I just point people in different directions. I don't make them."

"That doesn't make any sense."

The Frenchman had already made his way down the hall, tugging at Germaine's luggage constantly.

"I can already tell this is something I didn't sign up for. Hell, this is probably the total opposite. But what's the point of not looking into this...I'm already here."

Germaine turned to the left where both the buffet and the spa resided. Yet, she couldn't decide on what to do first...

info.brief_description: Your favorite characters hit up a farm designed to fatten them up like pigs.
info.description:
A new spa has opened up and your favorite characters from video games, comic books, anime, etc, are all invited. Only thing is as soon as they show up they find that it looks an awful lot like a farm, and the spa treatments involve the women acting like pigs and eating until they're huge.

This is meant solely for fun so take the stories wherever you want, just leave options for other people in case they want to take it somewhere else.

This isn't meant to be an anthro or transformation style story, but if you want to take it in that direction feel free.

One quick rule though - Make sure to try and focus on the character or characters chosen in each storyline. Lots of times I see a story start on one character and then quickly it goes "yeah but let's just switch to these characters here and forget the main character." If you want to add more characters that's totally fine, just don't forget whoever it was that the story was about.
info.pretty_title: Your Favorite Ladies Hit the Fat Farm
